descriptionHtml:
[color=#1e84cc]This mod adds a light armor version and a heavy armor version of the Archmage's Robes.

To make these armors you wont need to have any skills or perks just be at a blacksmiths forge.

Also this is reversible by making the Archmages robes with any of the new armors added with this mod.

-----Light Armor-----
Armor Rating:20
Weight:5 
Enchantment: Archmages Enchantment
Crafted With: Archmages Robes, an Elven Cuirass, 5 Leather Strips  and 5 Dragon Scales
Improved With: 2 Malachite Ingots

-----Heavy Armor-----
Armor Rating: 44
Weight:10
Enchantment: Archmages Enchantment
Crafted With : Archmages Robes, 12 Dragon Scales, 5 Leather Strips and a Ebony Cuirass
Improved With: 2 Ebony Ingots

----- No DLC's required. -----
----- Should be compatible with re-texture mods. -----
----- Should there be any questions or problems just ask in the comments section -----
Enjoy:)[/color]

[color=#ff00ff]----- Update 1.2 I have made it more expensive to craft the armor to make it more balanced. Also I have fixed the crafting so it will recognise all both the hooded and unhooded robes -----[/color]

[color=#ff0000]----- Update 1.1 I know that people had problems with the unhooded version so, i have added 1 to Enthir's inventory so you can buy it off him for around 1000 gold he is located in the upstairs of the rooms in the college of Wintehold -----[/color]
author: Coope
